amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds to require the relocation, or to carry out any required location, of any asset management positions of the Office of Multifamily Housing of the Department of Housing and Urban Development in existence as of the date of the enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to require the relocation, or to carry out any required location, of any asset management positions of the Office of Multifamily Housing of the Department of Housing and Urban Development in existence as of the date of the enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Ms. Waters.
